description: This file defines a Python class 'FastApi' that extends 'DockerApp' to configure and manage a FastAPI application container, including environment variables, ports, and command settings.

classes.name: FastApi
classes.description: A class representing a FastAPI Docker application configuration, including environment setup and container parameters.

methods.name: get_container_env
methods.description: Generates environment variables for the container based on class attributes and superclass method.
